content: PBH S CRS KCOTE M1 Sharp-point drywall screws Collated drywall screw (Kwik-cote coated) for the SD-M 2 screw magazine – for fastening drywall boards to wood ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Screws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Designed for use with the SD-M 2 magazine on SD 4500-A22 and SD 4500 drivers High fastening frequency – get more done in less time Hilti has full control of the manufacturing process – delivering more reliable, consistent quality Corrosion resistance tested in 500 hours of salt-spray testing Collated screws for high-speed drywall installation with the SD-M 2 screw magazine Applications Fastening drywall boards to wood studs ### TECHNICAL DATA: Screw head type: Bugle head Screw drive/recess type: PH #2 Collated: Yes, compatible with SD-M 2 screw magazine Technical Data | Screw head type | Bugle head | Screw drive/recess type | PH #2 | Collated | Yes, compatible with SD-M 2 screw magazine | Product Class | Premium | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor, Indoor environments with temporary condensation ### ITEMS- 2133715 - Drywall screw 6x2 PBH S CRS KCOTE M1 - Package Size 4000 pc - 3872266 - 2 PBH S CRS KCOTE M1 1/2 PAL SDM2 - Package Size 1 pc - 3872286 - 2 PBH CRS KCOTE M1 1/2 PAL SDM2+DWA - Package Size 1 pc - 3872276 - 2 PBH S CRS KCOTE M1 PALLET SDM2 - Package Size 1 pc - 3872296 - 2 PBH S CRS KCOTE M1 PAL SDM2+DWA - Package Size 1 pc
